src:
Istana Hormati MA yang Coret Perpes Wajib Kerja Dokter Spesialis di Pelosok
05 Nov 2019, 14:17 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Mahkamah Agung (MA) mencoret kebijakan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyebar para dokter spesialis hingga ke penjuru Nusantara. Juru Bicara Presiden Jokowi, Fadjroel Rachman menegaskan pihaknya akan menghormati putusan tersebut.
"Yang pasti kalau sudah, kami menghormati peraturan perundang-undangan tentu saja. Artinya apabila peraturan perundang-undangan jelas menyatakan demikian, kita menghormati," kata Fadjroel di Kompleks Istana Kepresidenan, Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Fadjroel belum menjelaskan kebijakan Jokowi selanjutnya terkait penyebaran dokter spesialis. Pihaknya hanya menegaskan akan mengikuti prosedur hukum yang berlaku.
"Negara ini kan negara hukum, bukan negara kekuasaan, apabila semuanya sudah sesuai dengan prosedur hukum, kita hormati," tutur Fadjroel.
text:
Istana Respect the Supreme Court who has crossed the Perpes required for specialist doctors to work in remote areas
05 Nov 2019, 14:17 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - The Supreme Court (MA) crossed President Joko Widodo's (Jokowi) policy to spread specialist doctors across the archipelago. Spokesman for President Jokowi, Fadjroel Rachman emphasized that he would respect the decision.
"What is certain is that if we do, we respect the legislation of course. This means that if the legislation clearly states so, we respect it," said Fadjroel at the Presidential Palace Complex, Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5 / 2019).
Fadjroel has not yet explained Jokowi's policy regarding the distribution of specialist doctors. It only confirmed that it would follow the applicable legal procedures.
"This country is a state of law, not a state of power, if everything is in accordance with legal procedures, we respect it," said Fadjroel.
